name: Nu.nl Compact
description: Removes the excessive whitespace and big fonts of the April 16 2020 redesign of Nu.nl. Also removes the ad header and some other commercial content blocks and ads.
additional_info: April 17 2020: Version 1. I'm not sure how long NU will use the classes and id's I target with my css. I'll keep an eye on the site and edit the code if needed.
